text: Javier Arzalluz Antia (24 August 1932 â€“ 28 February 2019) was a Spanish politician. He was leader of the Basque Nationalist Party from 1979 until 2004. He was a nationalist and a Christian Democrat. He was born in Azcoitia, Basque Country. Besides his political role, he had also been a professor of Constitutional Law (in the Basque language) at the University of Deusto in Bilbao until 1999. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish Roman Catholics
title: Xabier Arzalluz
